headline: Tutorial
description: You have successfully opened your first online shop. But to attract more customers you should improve your website frequently!

headline: Tutorial
description: On the left you can see the editor view. From there you can buy upgrades and do research.

headline: Tutorial
description:
On the right you can see your current website.

Tip: You can buy your own product to increase your sales and to attract more people. Customers are stupid. They will not notice the difference.
